mapper.select: SELECT f.family_id, i.ing_name FROM usr u JOIN usr_family uf ON u.usr_id = uf.usr_id JOIN fam_allergen fa ON uf.family_id = fa.fam_id JOIN ingredient i ON fa.ing_id = i.ing_id JOIN usr_family f ON f.family_id = uf.family_id WHERE u.usr_id = #{usrId} ORDER BY f.family_id;
SELECT f.family_id, f.sugar_need, f.cal_need, f.fat_need FROM usr u, usr_family f WHERE u.usr_id = f.usr_id AND u.usr_id = #{usrId} ORDER BY f.family_id
